body.name: memzuoix 2.4G Wireless Mouse, 1200 DPI Mobile Optical Cordless Mouse with USB Receiver, Portable Computer Mice for Laptop, PC, Desktop, MacBook, 5 Buttons, Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 46 mins
features: 【MAXIMUM HAND-FEELING】 Modern contoured shape, sweat-resistant and skin-friendly finish are for maximum comfort and support. The thoughtful ring and little finger rest provide extra comfort. The sturdy scroll wheel with rubber makes sure that your hand will not slip when scrolling.

【PLUG & PLAY SUPER EASY TO USE】Really plug & play design, no drivers need to be installed. 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 43.0ft. Portable design make it easy to store in bag. It's the best mouse for a gifts.
【STRONG DURABILITY & LONG WORKING DISTANCE】Passed 6,000,000 times keystroke test to guarantee extra durability. 2.4GHz wireless technology and professional chip ensure longer working distance.

【EXTREMELY LOW POWER CONSUMPTION】 It takes 2 AAA Batteries(NOT Included) to operate this wireless mouse, and it will turn to sleep mode in 7mins of inactivity for energy saving, can be easily activated by clicking any buttons.

【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】Well compatible with Windows 7/8/10/XP, Vista 7/8, Mac and Linux etc. The cordless computer mouse for Laptop, Desktop, PC, Macbook, and other devices. This wireless mouse enjoys 45 days money-back and a 365-day worry-free warranty. Notice, the side buttons are not available for Mac OS, but the other function can be used normally.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: memzuoix Red Wireless Mouse offers cord-free convenience and comfort, this special Wireless Mouse comes with stable 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology, which not only provides powerful and reliable connection up to 43.0ft distance, but also ensures longer working. memzuoix cordless mouse with nano receiver works for laptop, desktop, computer and netbook PC. memzuoix team designs kinds of great mice for home, office or travel. memzuoix computer mouse with high quality, affordable cost and nice design, it's an ideal gift for family and friends.

Plug-and-Play Convenience, set up memzuoix Wireless Mouse in seconds: 1ST STEP: Remove the nano USB receiver from the battery compartment and simply insert the USB receiver into the USB port of a compatible computer; 2ND STEP: Put 2 AAA batteries(NOT INCLUDED) into the battery compartment, then replace the back cover; 3RD STEP: Flip the mouse’s power switch to “on” (located at the bottom), and it’s good to go. The unobtrusive nano receiver can stay plugged into a computer or bestowed on-board the mouse when not in use.

Longer Wireless Range 2.4GHz wireless technology and professional chip ensure longer working distance, up to 15 meters without interference. New Energy-saving Technology This wireless mouse turns to sleep mode in 7 minutes of inactivity for energy saving, can be easily activated by clicking any buttons. Long Battery Life Powered by 2 AAA batteries (NOT INCLUDED); reliable battery life solves the trouble of changing battery frequently.

Elegant & Comfortable Design: Ergonomic design, modern and elegant appearance with the advanced sensor ensures high precision and long durability responsive. Yon can use the mouse efficiently and fashionably. 1000 DPI: memzuoix Wireless Mouse with a default DPI of 1000. It will turn to sleep mode in 8 mins of inactivity for energy saving, and can be activated by clicking any buttons. Note: If you use the mouse and install new 2*AAA batteries (NOT INCLUDED) at the beginning, and the mice will work for about 2 months. If it doesn’t work, please replace it with a new battery. When you changed the new batteries, you must remove the USB receiver and turn the switch to OFF; Then re-inserting the USB, turn on the mouse's ON button; So that the receiver and the mouse can match well and can be work correctly. Package Include: 1 x Wireless Mouse Red; 1 x USB Receiver; 1 x User Manual Please kindly note: NO BATTERY included in the package

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great little mouse. It is very responsive and smooth. The battery life seems to be very good. Overall a great mouse for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great and Looks Good
reviews.reviewText: I got this mouse to replace an old Logitech mouse that I had for more than a few years. The old mouse had just worn out over time, and it would take more than a few clicks to get the computer to respond. At first I blamed my computer and swore I would throw it out the window. Luckily I decided to go the cheaper route and get a new mouse. This mouse had good reviews, and at 48% off was a great deal. I received the mouse quickly and once I plugged in the dongle, inserted the AAA batteries and turned it on it really took off. I had to go into settings and adjust the mouse cursor speed and scrolling speed to my preferred settings and it is working GREAT. I like that it has the sleep function to save battery life. It is not a big deal to push a button to activate the mouse after it is unused for 7 or 8 minutes depending on which part of the description you read. I go the red one and I really like the matt finish. The chrome bezel around the scrolling wheel adds a nice touch. The forward and back button on the side are a nice addition, but I doubt if I will use them much. All in all it was a great purchase and I am very happy with the new mouse. OBTW instead of the computer, the old mouse was thrown out the window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First off I am not a gamer and I didn't feel right giving it less stars for gaming. I love this mouse. It's must have for the CAD software I use for my desk top laser/etcher. It has taken me awhile to get used to the track pad on my lap top but still prefer to use a mouse when i'am sitting at a table or work bench. I like the way this feels in my hand, best one yet. I have to use a USB to USBC adapter on my Mac Book but I have to use on to connect my laser so it's not a issue at all. I am not a big fan of the feel of a Mac mouse and Mac seems to have the only Bluetooth mouse that work well according to the reviews that I have read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I was wrong ☹️
reviews.reviewText: I previously said that the mouse stopped working shortly after getting. Well, it was me doing something wrong 🙁. So other than it nit being silent as stated in the search, it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ergonomics of this mouse are perfect for me. So perfect that I ordered three and replaced the mouse on each of my laptops. It's easy to install and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Fits had nicely! Very easy to use!I like the fact the chip was secure inside the battery compartment during shipping.No hassle plug and play. Connection was immediate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised and great price!
reviews.reviewText: My new mouse arrived quickly and it was exactly what I was expecting to get. Purple is a nice, vibrant purple. Works great with my new work computer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for Dad.
reviews.reviewText: I got this from my dad because he got a brand new computer. And the laptop mouse pad can be difficult for him to use. He seems to really like it. It works perfectly. Easy to install as many are. It does need AAA batteries which I didn't pay attention to but we luckily had some on hand. I am a left-hander so it's not really great for me. But he is right-handed so it is perfect for him.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect fit to what I wanted.
reviews.reviewText: A nice surprise was am auto shut off when not in use; just push one of the buttons to restart when you turn on the computer. No info about this on the instructions. Color was a little duller than pictured but good.
Ergonomique. C'est un plus lorsque l'on travaille beaucoup avec la souris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Nice green colour, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I chose this mouse because of the colour - I hate black and grey stuff. It was a good buy, comfortable under my hand, works well, on/off switch underneath, and an automatic cut-out if mouse not used for 7 minutes so economical on battery life (uses 2 triple-A batteries). It's the first time I've not had a wired mouse; a little USB thingy is stored in the empty battery compartment which you take out and plug into your laptop which then enables the mouse to work. I've only had it a few days so can't comment on its staying power.
とりあえずと思い急いで購入。軽くて使いやすい。
I bought one for my laptop, and loved it so much, I bought another for the home PC. Extremely easy to use.
